txt.en:
Wargs, the hounds of the Enemy, prowl the foothills and eastern plains of Nan Amlug and Rhunenlad, threatening inhabitants and travellers alike.

Any who could slay a goodly number of them may frighten the Wargs enough to cease their hunts for the flesh of Men. The kindred of Rangers are stretched thin across the North Downs and beyond on missions of great import, and are unable to deal with this threat.

Whoever completes this request shall be rewarded.
You have assisted the Rangers of Esteldín in their daily vigilance, maintaining that the lands of the North Downs are free from enemy control.
'Wargs serve as the Enemy's advance scouts...slay them, [placeholder], before they can reveal our location.'
The Rangers have requested help in securing the lands around Esteldín and warding off any threats.
Wargs prowl the plains and foothills of Nan Amlug and Rhunenlad, east of Esteldín.\n\nYou should hunt down and slay the cruel hounds of the Enemy.
You have assisted the Rangers of Esteldín in their daily vigilance, maintaining that the lands of the North Downs are free from enemy control.
